entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Clearing this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 25. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Monday 23 January 2023
